intro: Aciotis pellucida, commonly known as slenderleaf ironweed, is a flowering plant native to the United States and parts of Mexico. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in dry, open habitats such as prairies and woodlands. It features narrow, lance-shaped leaves and produces small, pale yellow to greenish flowers. Aciotis pellucida is known for its hardy nature and ability to thrive in poor soil conditions.
